LanguageData.XMonsters_FastHealing.label: free fast wound healing
LanguageData.XMonsters_FastHealing.description: Does not require metabolism for rapid wound healing.
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperFastHealing.label: cheap super fast wound healing
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperFastHealing.description: A cheap analogue of the <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color> that heals wounds super-fast.
LanguageData.XMonsters_HyperFastHealing.label: hyper fast wound healing
LanguageData.XMonsters_HyperFastHealing.description: And this is already really fast healing of wounds.
LanguageData.XMonsters_UltraFastHealing.label: ultra fast wound healing
LanguageData.XMonsters_UltraFastHealing.description: Okay, we take it back - this is really fast healing of wounds.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ImpossibleFastHealing.label: impossible fast wound healing
LanguageData.XMonsters_ImpossibleFastHealing.descript: It's impossible to imagine how quickly wounds heal.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ArchoFastHealing.label: archofast wound healing
LanguageData.XMonsters_ArchoFastHealing.description: Carriers of this gene have a truly unimaginable speed of wound healing.
